Description: 
        
        # Use
        
        `nice-oom-daemon --stop-signal sigint=50 sigterm=50 sigkill=5 --grace-period 5`
        
        # Use in Docker
        
        ```
        docker build -t nice-oom-daemon .
        docker run -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock nice-oom-daemon
        ```

info.name: nice-oom-daemon
info.summary: A daemon for docker which sends signals to containers when they hit their memory soft limit.
info.html_description:

Description:

# Use

`nice-oom-daemon --stop-signal sigint=50 sigterm=50 sigkill=5 --grace-period 5`

# Use in Docker

```
docker build -t nice-oom-daemon .
docker run -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock nice-oom-daemon
```
